 <font size="6">Hello!</font>

I`m Melanie, a quantitative ecologist at [Aarhus University](https://pure.au.dk/portal/en/persons/melanie-tietje(6abaa223-a82b-4577-acce-f2ead58ba86b).html) , currently working in the TropiToL project (Explaining the biological hyperdiversity of Tropical rainforests using the Tree of Life). 
My work includes extinction risk influencing factors, geographic range size patterns, diversity, and recently the combination of climatic and biological data. I am interested in the possibilities of combining neontological and paleontological data to learn from past events about our possible future.
